src:
Prediksi Arsenal vs Wolverhampton 2 November 2019
01 Nov 2019, 15:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal dan Wolverhampton sama-sama baru tersingkir dari ajang Carabao Cup. Namun, kandasnya Arsenal lebih menyakitkan. Mampukah mereka langsung bangkit dengan meraih kemenangan di liga?
Peringkat 5 Arsenal akan menjamu peringkat 12 Wolverhampton di Emirates Stadium pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019).
Tengah pekan kemarin, Arsenal dikandaskan Liverpool di babak 16 besar Carabao Cup. Di Anfield, pasukan Unai Emery membuang keunggulan 3-1, 4-2, dan 5-4, sebelum bermain imbang 5-5, kemudian tersingkir lewat adu penalti.
Bagi Arsenal, yang pekan lalu juga gagal menang di Premier League, imbang 2-2 menjamu Crystal Palace, Wolverhampton wajib dikalahkan. Hanya saja, itu sepertinya tidak bakal mudah.
Sama seperti Arsenal, Wolverhampton juga baru tersingkir dari Carabao Cup. Mereka menyerah 1-2 di markas Aston Villa.
Pekan lalu, Wolverhampton juga gagal menang di Premier League. Mereka bermain imbang 1-1 di kandang Newcastle United.
Secara performa, kedua tim ini tak jauh beda. Di Emirates Stadium nanti, akankah salah satu dari mereka berhasil kembali ke trek kemenangan?
text:
Predictions Arsenal vs Wolverhampton 2 November 2019
Nov 01 2019, 15:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal and Wolverhampton are both just eliminated from the Carabao Cup. However, the aggression of Arsenal is more painful. Can they immediately rise to victory in the league?
Rank 5 Arsenal will host Wolverhampton 12th at the Emirates Stadium in Week 11 of the Premier League 2019/20, Saturday (02/11/2019).
In the middle of last week, Arsenal beat Liverpool in the last 16 of the Carabao Cup. At Anfield, Unai Emery's men threw away a 3-1, 4-2 and 5-4 advantage, before drawing 5-5, then were eliminated on penalties.
For Arsenal, who last week also failed to win in the Premier League, a 2-2 draw at home to Crystal Palace, Wolverhampton must be defeated. However, it does not seem to be easy.
Just like Arsenal, Wolverhampton also just eliminated from the Carabao Cup. They surrendered 1-2 at Aston Villa headquarters.
Last week, Wolverhampton also failed to win in the Premier League. They drew 1-1 at home to Newcastle United.
In performance, the two teams are not much different. At the Emirates Stadium later, will one of them succeed in returning to the victory track?
